welcome_message_body: Welcome to Caguas, Puerto Rico! Get ready to experience the charm and rich history of our city, known for its vibrant cultural scene and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything Caguas has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and charter flights, providing exclusive services for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
